page.title: 03Life In Skelbrooke.
page.content: Skelbrooke is a small village situated at the side of the Great North Road, known as the A1. The village is{very {small with not much life.}Most of the villagers come from Askern and one from a place called Castle Donnington in Leicester.Hardly any of them work because they are{elderly and retired. Nearly all of the villagers have a car to go shopping at{Carcroft}because there{are no shops}in Skelbrooke. Those we interviewed told us they did a lot of sport in their leisure time such as{golf, swimming, sailing and {squash. The people around Skelbrooke have always had a fairly good community spirit as we found out when we interviewed them. Around Skelbrooke is a{Green Belt}so there are no further plans for development in the future.
